title: Chapter 2634 - Chapter 2634 Chapter 2634-Ranking Soars
body:
Chapter 2634 - Chapter 2634 Chapter 2634-Ranking Soars

Chapter 2634 Chapter 2634-ranking soars

Just as the Tiger youth’s palm was about to hit Lu Ming, Lu Ming’s fingers were like a long spear, pointing out.

A ray of spear light burst forth. It was extremely bright and fast.

Pfft!

The body of the young man from the Tiger Tribe suddenly froze in mid-air. This was because the s.p.a.ce between his eyebrows had been pierced by Lu Ming’s spear gleam and he had died on the spot.

Bang!

Then, the body of the Tiger youth exploded with a bang and dissipated into energy.

“You …”

Hu Mao and the others were all shocked.

This was completely beyond their expectations.

A mere transformation void martial artist from the chaotic astral River had actually killed a heaven’s pride expert of the Tiger clan with a single move.

After the shock, it was anger.

brat, you dare to kill the people of my Tiger clan? you’re courting death!

The Tiger roared.

“You talk too much nonsense!”

Lu Ming said coldly. He clenched his fist and a long spear was formed.

Whoosh! Whoosh!

Lu Ming could not be bothered to waste his breath and attacked directly. In an instant, a few terrifying spearlights burst out and killed the few Tiger clan youths.

“Attack, attack together! I want him to suffer a fate worse than death!”

The Tiger roared.

Roar! “Roar!”

The young men of the Tiger clan roared like tigers and their divine power condensed into all kinds of weapons that charged at Lu Ming.

“Good!”

Lu Ming let out a long howl and the long spear trembled. Seven changes appeared instantly and the Spear’s radiance was thrust out. Each of the Spear’s radiance contained seven levels of power.

These Tigermen youths could not withstand it at all.

Pfft!

BOOM!

Some of them were pierced through the glabella by the spear radiance, while others were swept by the long spear and directly split open.

The twenty or so Tigermen youths were like babies in Lu Ming’s hands. They could not even withstand a single blow.

Not all of these people controlled ordinary divine power. There were a few who controlled King grade divine power.

It was a pity that his understanding of the incomplete divine skill was so-so that it could not even withstand a single blow from Lu Ming.

The Tigermen tribe had many experts. Other than peerless geniuses like Hu ya, there were also some other top experts.

For example, tiger bone, one of the top three masters in the Dongcheng Area, was one of them.

If Lu Ming stayed here, he might collide with the Tiger bones.

In the next few days, the Tigermen tribe did not appear.

On the other hand, Lu Ming’s cultivation attracted the attention of some other experts who wanted to kill him. However, they were all killed by Lu Ming.

Lu Ming’s ranking had increased a little. He was close to the 200th place.

For nine consecutive days, Lu Ming had attracted more than ten young men and they all died at his hands.

Lu Ming’s reputation spread like this.

In the Dongcheng Area District, everyone placed Lu Ming on the same level as the other three top experts.

The news of Lu Ming’s battle with the Tigermen tribe spread and attracted many people to watch.

There were many young experts hiding in the hidden corners of some buildings in the area. They were looking at Lu Ming from afar.

They were waiting for an opportunity.

If Lu Ming really fought with the Tigermen tribe and both sides were injured, they would have a chance.

A person like Lu Ming must have a shocking number of points. If they could kill Lu Ming, their points would skyrocket.

Many people had this thought and hid in the dark.

On the eleventh day, Lu Ming was sitting cross-legged in the middle of the street, meditating on the incomplete divine skill with his eyes closed. At that moment, he suddenly opened his eyes.

In front of him, a figure was leaping from house to house at an astonishing speed.

In the blink of an eye, he was in front of Lu Ming.

Buzzzzzz! Buzzzzzz! Buzzzzzz!

With a flash, more than thirty young men from the Tiger Tribe appeared on the street in front of Lu Ming.

Lu Ming could see at a glance that one of them was Hu Mao.

At that moment, Hu Mao was looking at Lu Ming with a face full of hatred.

tiger bone, it’s him. It’s this b.a.s.t.a.r.d who killed more than 20 of our Tigermen and even threatened to wait here!

The Tiger pointed at Lu Ming and roared.

Bang!

In front of the Tiger fur, a young man with an especially burly figure stepped out.

This person was one of the top three experts in the Dongcheng Area, tiger bone. He was also one of the top ten heaven’s favorites in the Tiger clan.

“You are Lu Ming? You’re really gutsy, daring to wait for us here?”

Tiger bone said coldly.

“Someone’s giving you free points, why not wait?”

Lu Ming asked.
